paragraph: John Harris (17??–1772) was a Bostonian maker of spinets and harpsichords.
John Harris emigrated from England to Boston sometime before 1768. He completed his first spinet in 1769.
Morse, Francis Clary. Furniture of the Olden Time. pp 284–286. [1]
Spinet by John Harris in the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston
